levels.description: Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>. Attacks become toxic finspines that fire directly ahead, piercing through up to <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> enemies and inflicting <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish}</> second
